check.name: SuperFinalize
check.description:
Checks that an overriding {@code finalize()} method invokes {@code super.finalize()}. Does not check native methods, as they have no possible java defined implementation.

References: How to Handle Java Finalization's Memory-Retention Issues; 10 points on finalize method in Java.

property.name: ignoreModifier
property.description: Control whether to ignore checking for the {@code SuperFinalize} modifier on classes that match the name.

property.name: ignoreName
property.description: Control whether to ignore checking the name. Realistically only useful if using the check to identify that match name and do not have the {@code SuperFinalize} modifier.
